# Skew

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class              | Support        |
| ------------------ | -------------- |
| `skew-x-{n}`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `skew-x-[n]`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `skew-y-{n}`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `skew-y-[n]`       | ✅ Full Support |
